author: time news
title: kyiv claims to have sunk Russian missile ship in Crimea - TIme News
text: 2024-02-01 20:39:39 Ukraine affirmed this Thursday, February 1, that it had ” destroy “ during the night a missile launcher belonging to the Russian Black Sea Fleet and which was patrolling off the coast of Crimea, a peninsula annexed by Moscow and regularly attacked by kyiv. Russia has not made an official comment and has not reported damage to one of its boats, but a Telegram channel close to the Russian military reported a vessel “damaged”. The rest after the ad Ukrainian military intelligence (GUR) said it managed to ” to flow “ the “Ivanovets” missile launcher in the area of Lake Donuzlav, on the west coast of Crimea. Josep Borrell: “Ukraine’s victory is the best security guarantee for Europe” The boat “patrolled the sea” near the lake, Andriï Yussov, spokesperson for Ukrainian military intelligence, told AFP. Dating from 1989 and 56 meters long, this star is equipped in particular with four Moskit supersonic anti-ship cruise missile launch systems, according to a website of the Russian Black Sea Fleet. “Due to a number of direct impacts on the hull, the Russian ship suffered damage making movement impossible – Ivanovets […] has sunk “, indicated the GUR on Telegram. The service accompanied this message with a video showing a boat exploding in a spectacular fireball. However, the authenticity of these images, and where they were filmed, cannot be independently confirmed. The rest after the ad Success stories in the Black Sea Ukraine, whose land troops came up against solid Russian defenses during their counter-offensive, can on the other hand boast of successes in the Black Sea. In recent months, it has defeated a Russian fleet reputed to be much more powerful, managing to keep its ships away from the South-West of this sea. [See also It is a “collective, excessive and cruel punishment,” denounces the Spanish doctor evacuated from Gaza](https://time.news/it-is-a-collective-excessive-and-cruel-punishment-denounces-the-spanish-doctor-evacuated-from-gaza/) The Telegram channel Rybar, close to the Russian army, spoke of a nighttime Ukrainian attack in Lake Donuzlav. One of the Russian boats was “damaged”Rybar said Thursday morning, affirming that the extent of the damage remained to be assessed. Ammunition shortage in Ukraine: “The risk is to have a strategic agenda imposed by Putin” On Wednesday evening, Russia indicated that it had destroyed twenty missiles launched by Ukraine over the Black Sea and in Crimea. Of the ” debris “ had fallen into the territory of a “military unit” in Lyoubymivka, near the city of Sevastopol, the Defense Ministry said. Crimea, annexed by Russia in 2014, is a favored target for Ukraine because it is very important for the logistics of the Russian army. #kyiv #claims #sunk #Russian #missile #ship #Crimea
